name: leveleven
description:
Thank you for playing my game.

Goal

There are eleven objects. These must be placed on the beam to make it level and even for three seconds. leveleven

Controls

Mouse - left-click and drag to move objects

R - Restart level

Design Notes

My first game. Initial upload is very simple. Intention is to improve gameplay with various, more complex shapes and unusual balance beams, across multiple levels.

This is very much a prototype and proof of concept.
